ca.uwaterloo.crysp.otr

Class PrivKey

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.uwaterloo.crysp.otr.PrivKey

  • public class PrivKey
extends java.lang.Object
    A PrivKey stores the private and public long-term authentication keys for an individual account. Note that encryption keys are not stored anywhere, in order to achieve forward secrecy.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
